name: Kamidori Alchemy Meister
storyline: In the Setetori region of the southern part of the Raulbhach continent lies the Mikelti Kingdom, and amongst the seven major cities of this region is the workshop city of Yuidora. This is where a young orphan named Wilfred lives, pursuing his dream of becoming an alchemist. However, soon after gaining his license he gets entangled with three girls with differing personalities and goals, and he soon agrees to hire them as his guards in order to help each other out. Like this, Wil begins his life as an alchemist, surrounded by the ever growing group of his allies as he follows his parents' footsteps in becoming a great alchemist.
summary:
Adult SRPG with visual novel elements. Gameplay has a heavy focus on item creation, which requires you to kill monsters and get materials to make equipments and items. These can then be sold in your workshop or kept for you and your party members. The story has 9 chapters and 3 routes, as well as New Game+ quests. 
 
Spiritual sequel of Himegari Dungeon Meister, with a heavier focus on item creation.
